overview:
Christoph Zrenner is the CEO and Co-Founder of Wildfire Pte Ltd, an influencer word-of-mouth media company based out of Singapore and Shanghai.

Before becoming a full-time technology entrepreneur, Christoph studied medicine and qualified as a doctor. During his research work in neuroscience he developed an experimental method for the real-time modification of brain cell activity using multi-electrode-arrays (published in Frontiers Neuroscience).

He met his co-founder, Benjamin Duvall at an MBA program in Singapore and in 2008, they founded Wildfire where Christoph is leading the development of a new product to modify online conversations in real-time through engaging authentic consumers; the platform is based on a technology architecture combining large data, smart algorithms and game mechanics.
